name: Dungeon Delver (itch) (Mplode)
description:
No money accepted for this project since it uses multiple IPs from various companies.  This project was created in January 2020 for a university course.  Purely for educational use.

It's a simple Zelda 1 clone.  The cool thing here is that the dungeon is created using a text file instead of being laid out in Unity.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Z for Z item
  • X for X item

Good luck!  The ending is a meme for a streamer I was watching at that time.
